name: Getting_Started
description: Yow, friend! You don't know me, I don't know you, but if you listen along, you might survive. We might even have fun. Or become friends. I hope we become fr.. *eek* sorry! I talk too much. Let's get you into the game.

name: Practice_Makes_Good_Enough
description: Listen up maggot, I don't have the time nor patience for boring matches. Now I don't know what that other Voi taught you, but lucky for me, I've got an army of semi-sentient beings ready to have a go at you and figure it out. After all, only the mighty may enter the real Arenas! Go on then, play Practice matches, collect Gray Essences and prove you're worth it!

name: Let_it_Shine_on_You
description: Only those seeking to enforce Divine Justice are offered a chance to wield our Power Gems. Prove your sense of Duty to the High Order, and be baptized in Light from Head to Toe.Only those seeking to enforce Divine Justice are offered a chance to wield ou

name: The_Art_of_Combat
description: Meeting your enemies head,on, as a Deadly Force , this is what it means to be part of the Elven Pact. Only true Masters of Combat are allowed to take our Power Gems in their Hands.

name: Lightning_Eyes
description: The Resistance only issues its Power Gems to certain types of people. They must have the Spark in the Eyes, and the unbending Resolve to protect everyone they hold dear.

name: Heart_of_the_Mountain
description: So you came seeking the Devil's Seeds. To take on our Power Gems, is to embrace the Burning Shadows themselves , have the desire to forge a Core of Magma, and the Patience to see it through.

name: How_Rivers_Cut_Through_Rocks
description: The Evolution's Assault welcomes all who put their Feet down, and show the world that Nature always Persists. Embrace this, and be granted the Forest Spirits Power Gems.

name: Hug_Smash
description: If it stands in your way, Smash it. If it stands up, Smash it again.If it brings friends, Smash them too. This is the way to victory. This is the way of..the DEEEESSTRRROOOYYYEEERRR!  Mwa,ha,ha,h....aaah..ehmm..ok bullshit aside, we will Unleash your St

name: No_Survivors
description: If you came here, you must be one who seeks to Perfect their Technique. Our Fighting Style is not for the faint of heart if you insist we will Drill you into the shape of a true Assassin, capable of releasing a Relentless Assault on your targets. Prep

name: Welcome_to_the_Machine
description: It's sad, really. How can they hope to win if they don't Think creatively? Come. I'll expand your horizons. You'll learn how to Adapt to everything, Control every situation. You know 'Deus ex Machina'? Forget the ex , no, not your ex , I'll turn you int

name: Universal_Balance
description: Hi.I'm glad you've come. This is your first step in walking the path of Faith. Sit.Relax.Accept.Find your inner self, and let it guide you , Meditate on your findings, and rediscover your reality. Decide your place within this world.Be reborn as a Spirit

name: Unbreakable_Objects
description: Do you have any idea how many people think they can Protect others, when they can't even Protect themselves? It's cheap bravado. They skip the cruel Conditioning required to build up the necessary Resistance that would turn them into an Indomitable Shiel

name: Its_time
description: Hello again, Little Soul. You made it this far, and now it's time to see what you are really made of. Let the true games begin.

name: Challenge_of_the_Soul_Conqueror
description: Win {0} Matches

name: Challenge_of_the_Soul_Collector
description: Across matches, keep at least 3 Soul Spheres for {0} seconds.

name: Challenge_of_the_Soul_Stealer
description: Across matches, steal {0} Soul Spheres by defeating their owners.

name: Challenge_of_the_Soul_Protector
description: Across matches, return {0} Soul Spheres to their owners by defeating those who had stolen them.

name: Look_Ma_I_have_a_Job
displayName: Look Ma, I have a Job
description: NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_DESCCollect 50,000 Gray Essences from Normal Matches_1_18

name: Hey_Im_Good_at_this
description: Collect 500,000 Gray Essences from Normal Matches

name: Fields_of_Gray
description: Collect 5,000,000 Gray Essences from Normal Matches

name: Nothing_Beats_the_Real_Thing
description: So you're not entirely worthless. Let's see how you fare against some actual opponents.

name: Perfect_Practice_makes_Perfect
description: Damn right little maggot! This is becoming promising. I'm hyped about you. Prove me right!

name: You_Make_me_Proud
description: This is it. Show the world the warrior I've created!

name: That_White_Stuff_is_Good
description: Collect 1,000,000 white essences from ranked matches

name: Give_me_More
description: Collect 1,000,000 white essences from ranked matches

name: White_Mountain
description: Collect 1,000,000 white essences from ranked matches

name: Hmm
description: Hmm.. You made it.In one piece, I might add. Let the true games, begin.

name: Ohhh
description: Ohhh..? So you can actually do things. Let me see how far you can get.

name: Interesting
description: Interesting..! It seems I was right about you after all.And now I can only wonder.. Will you.. Entertain me?

name: First_Bloods
description: Defeat an opponent with each of your Attack abilities.

name: Master_Predator
description: NEW_ACHIEVEMENT_DESC_1_31Defeat two opponent in a row with each of your Attack abilities.

name: Undying_Victorious_Soul
description: Win a match without being defeated a single time.

name: Total_Annihilation
description: Defeat every opponent within 15 seconds

name: All_Your_Souls_Are_Belong_To_Me
displayName: All Your Souls Are Belong To Me
description: Simultaneously hold every Soul Sphere

name: Inner_Strength
description: Win a match without using a single Power Up

name: SingleMinded_Elemental
description: Honor each of the Five Factions by winning a match using Abilities only from that Faction's Element

name: Style_Unparalleled
description: Honor each of the Five Federations by winning a match with their Fighting Style.

name: You_Reap_what_you_Sow
description: Defeat an opponent that is holding every Soul Sphere.

name: Citizen_of_the_World
description: Become acknowledged by the Five Factions of Delasphos and unlocked their Element.

name: Member_of_the_Cause
description: Prove yourself to the Five Federations of Delapshos, and attuned to their Fighting Style.

name: All_the_Items
description: Collect all of the Items available for purchase.

name: All_the_History
description: Collect all of the Lore items available for purchase.

name: All_the_Trials
description: Complete all of the Trials

name: All_the_Challenges
description: Complete every Challenge at least once.

name: Impossible
description: Thank you little Soul. You've grown past beyond anything I could have hoped. I've asked my Vois at Tall Guy Productions to create a proper reward for you.

name: All_the_Achievements
description: Get all the Achievements, except this one. Cause that would cause an infinite loop.

name: Before_it_all_Began_pt_I
displayName: Before it all Began, pt. I
description: The Astral Planes of Leth, the Mother Realm, is an entire universe, unknown to anyone that still has a breath in their body; for only the Souls of those who died may enter. In its center lies M' Or, the Heart of the Mother Realm ; a being made of pure, condensed Soul Energy. Following their orbital course around it, are the many planets of this ghostly realm. Depending on their size, each of them homes the Souls of those who lived in a certain planet, galaxy, or entire reality. Delasphos is an exoplanet, one of the smaller ones, and it's the home of all those who were once on Earth. It is inhabited by the reincarnations of these souls ; Humans and Gnomes. Or, to be precise, it used to. Everything changed when the War of Souls began.

name: Before_it_all_Began_ptII
description: Year 0 of the new calendar of Delasphos.The War of Souls begins and ends on the same day. They say history is written by the victors.So what happens when both sides lose? This War left the entire Mother Realm devastated, and those who fought in it, perished instantly. Those studying the Astral Planes have gathered only bits and pieces of what happened that fateful day.A beam of searing light, of pure energy, was fired into M' Or, the Heart of the Realm. And then, Chaos. You see, M' Or is the very reason the afterlife functions as it does. A being of highly concentrated and pure Soul Energy, it powers Aeth, the Soul Stream which leads the dead to their respective planets, and it keeps those planets anchored closely so that it may act as an energy source for them. When it was shot, it started leaking at an incredible rate.Nearby planets detonated due to the overflow , planets far away withered and died, unable to sustain their souls. That is when the human Arch,Sorceress,to,be, Nimelle Dios, stepped up far beyond the call of her duty.

name: Before_it_all_Began_ptIII
description: Year 0, Day 0, Minute 0, Second 0. It was during Nimelle's Awakening ceremony ; celebrating her imminent rise to the rank of Arch,Sorceress, that the afterlife as we knew it changed forever. Within a few seconds, there was a flash of light, an explosion and a blast wave of soul energy expanding outwards from M' Or, devastating anything it came in contact with. The closest planets, detonated instantly. On Delasphos, terraforming began. The earth split in half, mountains emerged out of nowhere, lakes started spiraling upwards into the air, mountains turned into volcanoes and in certain places time stood still.All 3 Arch Sorcerers were present ; and they agreed on one thing; we were all doomed. Yet, defiant as ever, Nimelle hugged her best friend, held her tears inside, and calmly levitated high above everyone else. She took a deep breath, and saved us with the humblest of spells ; a Drain from her left hand absorbed half of the shockwave from M' Or's energy, and she redirected that to her right hand, chanelling a super,charged Shield to block the rest. Despite the success of her insane plan, the pain of having M' Or's energy course through her body must have been beyond excruciating, because all of us still hear her screams ; and as a testament, we renamed the summit of this mountain accordingly. No longer entirely human, but more of a demi,godess, she held on long enough to save us, before fainting into a long comma.

name: Before_it_all_Began_ptIV
description: Nimelle's defiance and results, inspired the Arch,Sorcerers to act. Of the nearby planets drift away into nothingness, they opened portals to the three closest ones ; the Elven planet, the Dwarven planet and the planet of the Orcs. It wasn't long before M' Or stabilized itself, the portals closed, and those who came through them were stuck with us on Delasphos, one of the few planets of the Mother Realm that survived the War of Souls. The terraforming brought to the surface the underwater gnomes, a Tribe which was residing peacefully alongside Humans ever since time began, each other's knowledge of the other's existence long,lost in the annals of history. The planet's soil was not the only thing that suffered from the exposure to the soul energy. Many of the forest's animal's , wolves and lizards, birds and dragons, absorbed great amounts of soul energy. Some died instantly while others mutated over the next two decades, giving rise to entirely new species which battled for supremacy in the forests. Aaracocras and Dragonborns were the victors, if one can describe mass extinction as a victory. In the end of it all, Delasphos was no longer , and would never again be , the same; the planet's surface had changed permanently, and there were now 8 Tribes being forced into co,existence.

name: The_Beginning_of_this_Era_ptI
displayName: The Beginning of this Era, pt.I
description: Half a century has passed since the portals closed, and things are finally looking up. But it wasn't always like that. In the beginning, war raged for a good ten years as borders wer pushed backwards and forwards, and humans and gnomes were forced from their homes.When there wasn't war, the remainder of the Soul Energy would surge the land ravaging rivers, crops and cities. It took a while, but things eventually settled. The Resistance caved in and accepted its fate: these people were here to stay, and there was no way out of this havoc unless all of them were content. So, at year 13 since the War of Souls, representatives from every Tribe gathered up at the old capital of Delasphos ; Valnor, to talk about the necessary peace.

name: The_Beginning_of_this_Era_ptII
displayName: The Beginning of this Era, pt.II
description: The Valnor negotiations were a disaster. Everyone had come bearing gifts, and discussions were underway, when the explosions started. It was the war,lusty King of the Humans, Sever Pott the Fourth who had decided the best course of action was to become aThe anniversary of the Clover treaty is celebrated by most of Delasphos, but definitely not all of it.  Although things have calmed down, there are still those who have not forgotten, nor forgiven and are not content with sharing the same world with the people who murdered their families , and that feeling goes both ways. Still, the current rulers are the ones who signed the Treaty, so things are generally under control. There are clear borders, determining where each faction is allowed to act and since no one openly wants to start another war, they are respected (with the help of the High Order). The old human cities which other factions have now rebuilt and claimed as capitals were originally built near key natural resources.So now while each faction has a firm grasp on a few key resources, it certainly needs the others to survive. Deep down, each of the Factions would more or less prefer to be the only one on Delasphos's surface , a view some take even further, and apply it to their own Tribe instead of Faction. While no one is really ready to move forward, they have to ; and this is the main drive that's been keeping the peace.

name: The_Beginning_of_this_Era_ptIII
displayName: The Beginning of this Era, pt.III
description: The anniversary of the Clover treaty is celebrated by most of Delasphos, but definitely not all of it.  Although things have calmed down, there are still those who have not forgotten, nor forgiven and are not content with sharing the same world with the people who murdered their families , and that feeling goes both ways. Still, the current rulers are the ones who signed the Treaty, so things are generally under control. There are clear borders, determining where each faction is allowed to act and since no one openly wants to start another war, they are respected (with the help of the High Order). The old human cities which other factions have now rebuilt and claimed as capitals were originally built near key natural resources.So now while each faction has a firm grasp on a few key resources, it certainly needs the others to survive. Deep down, each of the Factions would more or less prefer to be the only one on Delasphos's surface , a view some take even further, and apply it to their own Tribe instead of Faction. While no one is really ready to move forward, they have to ; and this is the main drive that's been keeping the peace.

name: Wandering_Souls
description: Factions were born out of necessity, in a time of war, panic and chaos.Trust was a hard currency at that point. Five decades since, and those wounds have closed , but the scars remain. Factions are still mostly made up of the Tribes that formed them, and are not very open to outsiders. Yet, at about a 1 to 10 ratio in the main cities and 1 to 20 or less in the further ones, you will come across people from a Tribe that would normally belong to another Faction.It is usually curiosity, love or just self,preservation that brought them there. Although these immigrants are never treated aggressively (thanks to the Clover Treaty), they are almost always considered second,rate citizens. To what extent, that depends on the Faction's hospitality and way of life.

name: Nimelle
description: Nimelle Dios was going to be the first Arch,Sorceress in the history of Delasphos, a title traditionally held by men. Instead, she became a demi,godess and saved our planet. She was a kind,hearted, ever,curious sorceress. Understood by a handful of people, beloved by her two friends, and shunned by most of her colleagues for her unorthodox yet highly efficient methods. She protected Delasphos by absorbing M' Or's Soul Energy, but sacrificed her humanity in doing so. She now holds powers beyond her own control, and her consciousness is often adrift. Fearing the worst, she transported the manor of her old master to the Duggen Icelands, where no road can reach it, and no eye can see it, and secluded herself in it. Despite her distance, we are still at the mercy of her whims ; when she's calm, the sky is clear. When she's happy, the earth grows.When she's sad, the atmosphere gets heavy. And if she gets angry.. volcanoes happen. So everyone is working together to keep her content.

name: The_Vois
description: Nimelle might have acted fast in protecting us from most of the shockwave of M' Or's Soul Energy, but it still managed to scar Delasphos permanently.Many forest species died either to mutation or to the inter,species slaughtering that took place during the crazy decades following the War of Souls. Besides Dragonoids and Aaracocras, Vois were among the few that survived. We know little of these furry creatures and the relations they had with the original residents of Delasphos. Mainly legends of some 'Children of the Forest', described as playful, curious and inherently kind ; despite being natural,born pranksters. These children suffered a terrible fate during the War of Souls ; infected by M' Or's Soul Energy, and exposed to its residue for decades, they grew addicted to it.As time went on, the energy around their homes dissipated, leaving them hungry for a new source. That's when they grew irresistibly attracted to a powerful scent, and followed it from the forest all the way to the Dugen Icelands. The closer they got to the tundra, the harder it became to reach it, and many died in this migration ; yet a few finally reached a secluded mansion in the middle of this icy garden. There, they laid eyes on a beautiful hooded figure, that was beaming with more Soul Energy than they'd ever experiences. They knew they would never leave Nimelle's side again.

name: The_Arenas
description: The Vois' very existence is now linked to Nimelle, and they revere her for it. Their connection, intensified through the Soul Energy they absorb from her, allow them to peer into the sorceress' dreams, her Visions. Among all the Realities they saw, certain places kept coming up; a Graveyard, a Village, a Clearence. Using their little hands, they started building miniatures of those places.Toying with materials, scale and technique, they managed to create a result which made Nimelle happy. For a while. What's the point of these places without people in them? So one day, Nimelle had a brilliant idea ; why not have the Vois craft little bodies, and use her powers to implant Wandering Souls into them, reincarnating them so they can fight in the little places the Vois had created.Many believe this is disrespectful to the order of Aeth, Soul Stream, yet no one dares say it. Instead, the Factions offer her little Power Gems and Weapons, and the Federations train her proven.. warriors in their Fighting Style, turning them to full,fledged battle souls, despite their size. That's a sure,fire way for them to earn Her favor, and keep Her happy at the same time.

name: The_FourLeafed_Clover
description: 'Here reigns the King of Valnor, first of his name and leader of men.' This epigraph once stood on the entrance to Valnor, the old Human capital. The city held strong for 12 years, and served as a neutral place for negotiations throughout that time. Yet, on the 13th year, it was defiled.Sever Pott the Fourth, King of the Humans, tooks his own life alongside everyone else's by blowing up the city when negotiations for a Peace treaty went awry.  When the four Factions agreed to the creation of a Peacekeeping force, Valnor seemed like the perfect place. Rebuilding a piece of the old world, shaping it like a four,leafed Clover to symbolize the unity, yet discreteness of the four factions, it would serve as a beacon of hope for a more fortunate future. That force was named the High Order, and was acknowledged by the Treaty as the fifth Faction, neutral to all, and tasked solely to keep the peace. As of year 48, the city is fully built, and its citizens (mostly soldiers, builders and their families) are eager to host the 10,year anniversary of the Clover Treaty.

name: Brick_and_Order
description: Besides being a symbol for peace, Clover also houses Delasphos's peacekeeping corps, the High Order. Each Faction contributes Soldiers to the High Order; enough that a balance of powers is preserved. It was agreed that the High Order should be powerful enough to protect any Faction from attacks of the other three, while at the same time not be powerful enough that all four Factions together would not be able to overtake it. Of course, some members of the High Order also take jobs on the side, mainly as Guardians in the Knights for Hire Federation. After the city is built, the other four Federations are planned to move their Headquarters here as well, although no one knows what the Assassins' will look like or where it's going to be. The Order and the Knights for Hire currently resides within Clover, as it is being built and have a symbiotic relationship with the Builders' Association ; one of the groups who benefitted most from this Treaty, as they were the sole contractors responsible for building an entire city. This steady amount of work, has brought many seeking to earn an honest living, despite of their origin. The result is a safe, grand city, home to people from all eight Tribes.

name: A_Monarch_chosen_by_her_People
displayName: A Monarch, chosen by her People
description: Of all the five Factions, the Resistance has the only claim on Delasphos's land, history and resources that can be considered 'objective' ; they were here first. The Faction is made up of the remainder of Delasphos's original population, Humans and Gnomes mixed with a few Half,Orcs and Half,Elves ; either the seed of rape, or of unwavering romance, flowering despite its odds. The people are ruled by a single Monarch, advised by his small council and the guild masters. Though systematically close to Tyranny, the Monarchy of the Resistance is built on Trust and necessity for quick decisions. Amyra, the current leader, was the second in command during the Resistance's battle to preserve what territorry it could. Relentless yet kind, she played a key role in establishing the Clover treaty during the second negotiations, despite what had happened during the first, and insisted on an open,doors policy towards those who seeked to join the Resistance, despite their Tribe. This openness has led to a flourishing of Trade, Science, Arts and, since nothing creative runs on an empty stomach, the Guilds make a habbit of paying well for Delasphos's best chefs, making the capital of the Resistance a foodie's paradise.

name: Guilds_and_Politics
description: Currently Amyra is favored by enough citizens to ensure stability, and her policy of welcoming outsiders, is widely respected. This mentality has attracted Tradesmen, Scientists, Artists and Chefs from all around Delasphos, to the Resistance's capital. The Tradesman's guild mainly wants to keep the peace, yet it is known to strong arm the other Factions, especially when it comes to basic resources produced by the Resistance's vast agriculture practice. Of course, they do it all within the extent of the law. The Guild of Arcane Arts has great prestige due to their study of Delasphos's elemental imbalance, and along with the Inventor's Guild their official mission is to make life better for everyone on this planet; but every coin has a flip side. Regardless, they steer away from politics. Besides the functional, the Resistance has a knack for the aesthetical as well. The Guild of Expression is known for nurturing an individual's latent talents, which becomes apparent during the many festivals that happen within the cities and villages. In most of these, commoners get a chance to taste what is considered the most divine food of the Realm ; normally affordable only by the privileged few. This culmination of guilds, is born and gives rise to the multi,cultural environment Amyra always envisioned.

name: Clipped_Wings_High_Spirits
description: Right after the portal closed, energy storms ravaged the skies. Thousands of birds and dragons felt their very souls being sucked clean out of their bodies.  While the Storm of Souls raged, ever so often a dragon or eagle soul would gather all of its strength and bolt its way down to the surface, desperate to find another host. Many monstrosities were born that night and many died instantly. Yet, the next morning marked the birth of the first Dragonborn and Araakokras. Dragon and eagle souls, fused with potent human bodies in perfect sync. No longer able to fly, they took shelter in the forest, and as they grew, they realized they could now think; they could hypothesize, and deduce, they could plan ahead. They took over the forest, and vowed to destroy those who would seek to further upset the fauna and flora of this planet. They became Evolution's Assault, and as a Faction they were present in both negotiation attempts. Since the Clover Treaty, they started bartering in raw materials, and most of the wood and stone that was used in building Clover came from them. They are also experts when it comes to matters of wildlife and weather, and their help has been critical to anticipating and preventing damage from torrential storms.

name: Stronger_Together
description: With nature's wisdom and love for peace as well as their ability to survive in harsh circumstances, the citizen's of Nature's assault found refuge in the abandoned mountain cities and claimed them for themselves. They have a council that is selected through voting and that decides for their course of action. They despise death yet they want their security. Although the council decides important issues, everyone is at liberty to create and manage a town so there are many clans, some of them rather influential. The Res R' Cher clan focuses on studying nature in attempts to control the wild weather for the faction's benefit. Their connection with the forest is second to none. Equally strong, for different reasons, The Hut Ur Khul are rather aggressive , a bit outcasted yet respected by the rest of the clans, they revere the Faction's propsperity above all and are often seen as the shield of the forest.

name: An_Unlikely_Alliance
description: Most Factions' Tribes are mismatched, but few hate each other as much as those of the Elven Pact. High Elves and Dark Elves, as well as some Half,Elves that were born during the war, make up for most of its citizens. As soon as the portals were open, the elves were prepared. They cast aside their differences, at least temprorarily, and rushed as two separate armies with one common goal; to conquer the world at the other side. And they would have, had the portalled remained open long enough for their entire armies to make it through. They have declared their twin capital cities to be Inl Thenmar and Onf Thenmar, an old human city, split in two. There's also rumors of Wood Elves that made it through the portal, but no one has seen any in the last 50 years. No matter how hard they tried, after the imminent threat disappeared and the Clover Treaty was signed, they could no longer unite under mixed leadership. So they now share a city split in half, and each Tribe abides to their own leaders and laws

name: Gods_and_Councils
description: Despite their differences, the Elves share a common leadership structure; a High Priest, followed by a Council of the Tribe's wisest. Each council meets behind closed doors regarding most issues. Internally, decisions are made by the noble families who are still influential and whose bloodlines go back to before the storm of souls. During times of war, martial law is enforced, and both councils are replaced by the Council of the Seven Blades; a joint military council tasked with assuring the faction's dominance. It's not uncommon to launch provocative or under,cover missions against other Factions, but evidence of this is hard to come by ; still, everyone knows and this has fueled the distrust towards the Elven Pact. As a result, emotions of the citizens are split; some believe it necessary, others see it as an obstacle to long,term peace. What's certain is that Inl and Onf Thenmar are not very often visited by other Factions.

name: All_Kinds_of_Laws
description: Every Faction abides to the Clover Treaty; a set of rules that take precedence above all else. But, the Elven Pact is a Faction which besides external struggles, suffers great internal tension as well.Two Tribes that have hated eachother for centuries, have now been forced by circumstances to share a city, and they've so far managed it without a civil war breaking out. This is thanks to a 3,tiered set of rules; Elven Laws, Divine Commands and Council Orders. Elven Laws revolve around peace,keeping between elves.Steal, lose a hand.Attack lose an arm. Kill, lose a head.This is enforced by the Capital Guard ; a military force who is bound by powerful oaths to both High Elvish and Dark Elvish gods to uphold these laws, oaths sealed by the Priests of each Pantheon. Divine Commands are who believe in them, and are offered as a guide to avoid divine punishment. Still, openly disrespecting a religion will get you face to face with the respective High Priest to decide your fate. Council Orders can only be refuse if the receiver believes they contradict the Clover Treaty, Elven Laws or their Tribe's Divine Commands. The Capital Guard or the appropriate High Priest judges the grounds for their disobedience and acts accordingly. This tight system of Laws makes most of Delasphos's inhabitants feel unwelcome at Inl and Onf Thenmar, and only visit if they have business with the Elven Pact.

name: Elven_Hearts
description: 'When our world collided with Delasphos, our two rival nations set aside their primitive clash and the years of frustrations. Bravely, we hoped against all hope, as there was so much at stake. Our very freedom was up against the ropes. The crowd understood that it was not Dark versus High, just Elf against Elf. And that neither of our nations could stand alone.' Verses by Thaduin, a survivor that witnessed the Truce between Dark and High Elves, the two Tribes that make up the Elven Pact. This very song inspired the creation of the Deadly Force Power gems ; High Elven magic, and Dark Elven combat prowess.

name: For_the_Children
description: When the portals opened, Orcs and Dwarves came from their respective planets as they were crumbling underneath their feet. Despite Delasphos undergoing torrential blizzards, thunderstorms and volcanic explosions, both Tribes were smiling with relief. No matter how slim, they finally had a chance at survival. Deep inside the caves of the Laughing Peak, they found a place to call home.It sheltered them, and brought them together ; yet something was wrong in the very air.Both Tribes' youngs would start behaving aggressively, as if being posessed. It wasn't long before the elders started hearing them too. 'Destroy'. 'Burn'. 'Kill'. 'Die'. Dark voices would echo in their minds. Only the eldest managed to escape, and made their way south, to the Cihr Mountains. Everyone else succumbed to the dark influence, and with a flame of destruction in their eyes, they ravaged the lands. Villages were burned, women raped and men killed.It took a thirty years of mining and researching the Core of Cihr Mountains for the elders to find a way to weaken the Dark One, and free their youths. A way that cost them their lives. Since then, the lack of all,out aggression from them has allowed for trade routes to be established, especially after being present in the Clover Treaty.Minerals and Gems are flowing outwards, with the cults controlling the distribution, and the Elders providing the supply. Despite that, the rest of the world never forgot their attrocities, and the faction's name of Devil's Seeds has stuck with them.

name: Law_of_the_Mountain
description: For three decades most Orcs and Dwarves were under the influence of the Dark Voice.Then, the voices suddenly stopped ; the Elders had sacrificed themselves to free them of the Dark One's influence. The Tribesmen felt..lost.All their life they had relied on their Elders for guidance, and ever since they came to Delasphos, the Voice had directed them on what to do. That's when those who claimed they could still hear the Voice started appearing, and Cults were born. These Cults are known for blind obedience to their Leader, whom they revere, since she, or he, are their only link to the Voice, which is a shared affinity between the different Cults.Even though, each leader interprets the Voice differently, they all claim it grants them demonic powers. There are many Cults, especially in the small villages spread on the footholds of the Laughing Peak.Some have a handful of people led by someone who was charismatic enough to convince them he hears voices, without having any demonic powers. Others can be large enough to spread throughout the northern slopes of the Cihr Mountains and might even have sworn cultists within the major cities. But as we approach the capital, there is only one cult; the cult of Tharizdun. Leading this cult is Morthos, a powerful orc sorcerer with demonic body parts resembling the great old one his cult reveres. Although he doesn't treat his people harshly, no one dares question his ruling. Those who aren't fond of the status quo of the Devil's Seeds' capital tend to leave, which has turned Ord Vuzdur into the cult's headquarters.
